General.Name: Jinneng Holding Shanxi Coal Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinneng Holding Shanxi Coal Industry Co.,ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sales of coal and related chemical products in China. It offers thermal coal mainly used in electric power, cement, building materials, and other industries. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Datong, China. Jinneng Holding Shanxi Coal Industry Co.,ltd. is a subsidiary of Jinneng Holdings Coal Industry Group Co., Ltd.

4.Name: Mr. Jianjun  Qian
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
